name: Motherboard
description: Intel® Z690 LGA 1700 ATX motherboard built for creators, with PCIe® 5.0, DDR5 support, Thunderbolt™ 4, 10 Gb and 2.5 Gb Ethernet, WiFi 6E, four PCIe 4.0 M.2 slots with heatsinks, plus a USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 front panel connector with Quick Charge 4+ support

name: Graphics Card
description: TUF Gaming GeForce RTX™ 3080 buffed-up design with chart-topping thermal performance

name: Cooling Fan
description: ROG Strix LC II 240 all-in-one liquid CPU cooler with Aura Sync, Intel® LGA1700 and AMD AM4/TR4 support and dual ROG 120 mm radiator fans
